question: Which nation does not share a maritime border with Comoros?
explanation: Angola does not share a maritime border with Comoros. Comoros is an island country located in the Indian Ocean, off the eastern coast of Africa, at the northern end of the Mozambique Channel. It is the fourth-smallest African nation by area. Comoros shares maritime borders with Madagascar and the French region of Mayotte to the southeast; Tanzania to the northwest; Mozambique to the west and Seychelles to the northeast.
